Subject: Battle Wages On

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He was low on energy. He fell to the ground. 
"Cant hold out much longer." He forced himself back up. He opened plasma
charge fire on Mobster. Six shots now headed for the gestalt.

::War Machine::

The giant gestalt stumbled back.
"Must convert back to seperate bots." He began to change back, to
seperate TF's.

::Demolition::

Demolition broke away from War Machine. His brain chip came back online,
as he transformed, back to bot mode.
He opened 50cal gattaling gun fire, on Mobster.

::DrillBit::

He avoided the fire balls. He returned fire with his gattaling gun, and
optics.
"Come on! Beast mode." He changed to beetle mode, and began drilling
back to base. He took an course that didn't give off his destination.
